ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Hymn n' DoTs
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night in FV fighting spiders we had some poisonings of course.  Hymn seemed to work as normal (i.e. worked with poison on). Teien Truescale ( Raging
ygData.messageBody:
Last night in FV fighting spiders we had
some poisonings of course. Hymn seemed
to work as normal (i.e. worked with poison on).
Teien Truescale ( Raging Boars)
24 Bard Prexus

-----Original Message-----
From: sentto-160851-20696-964625742-dbe=nwark.com@...
[mailto:sentto-160851-20696-964625742-dbe=nwark.com@...]
On Behalf Of Bill Costlow
Sent: Wednesday, July 26, 2000 8:36 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Hymn n' DoTs


Last night I noticed that with a poison DOT on me and
sing Hymm, I don't seem to gain or lose hp. Anyone
done a test?


--- Elijah Meeker <emeeker@...> wrote:
>
> I haven't heard any more about this, anyone know the
> status? Has Verant
> replied at all?
>
> Tszaaz
